scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Eight stereoscopic photographs, circa 1880 to 1910. The stereoscopes show Brooklyn churches, such as the Central Congregational Church and St. Ann's Church, Green-Wood Cemetery, and the ship Brooklyn. Images are identified by location and creator. All items originate from commercial photography studios and publishers.
